summary: SummaryKate Somerville's Stressed Skin Saviors is a 3-Piece Goat Milk Travel Kit. Available for a limited time at a 35% savings—treat yourself or gift it now!
details: DetailsBenefitsThis limited-edition travel-size trio calms dryness, replenishes moisture + keeps face and body very merry all winterDeeply nourishes dry, sensitive skinRelieves tightness + visibly reduces rednessSupports a healthy skin barrierKey IngredientsJojoba + Avocado: Hydrates + conditions to create unparalleled smoothness.Goat Milk: Soothes dry, sensitive skin with natural milk proteins.IncludesGoat Milk Moisturizing Cleanser (1.0 oz)Goat Milk Moisturizing Cream (1.0 oz)Goat Milk Soothing Body Lotion (1.0 oz)Item 2644937How To UseGoat Milk Moisturizing Cleanser: Good for: Morning + Evening.How often: DailyApplication: Apply a small amount to damp face + neck, and massage gently for 30 seconds. Rinse and gently pat dry.Goat Milk Moisturizing Cream: Good for: Morning + Evening.How often: DailyApplication: After cleansing, apply a thin, even layer to face + neck.Goat Milk Soothing Body Lotion: Good for: Morning + EveningHow often: DailyApplication: Apply all over body or areas where skin feels dry. Massage until absorbed.IngredientsGoat Milk Moisturizing Cleanser: Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycerin, Betaine, Propanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Xylitylglucoside, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Coconut Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Distearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprae Lac/Goat Milk/Lait de Chèvre, Tocopherol, Mel Extract/Honey Extract/Extrait de Miel, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Bisabolol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Xylitol, Anhydroxylitol, Parfum/Fragrance, Stearic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Xanthan Gum, t-butyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Salicylate.Goat Milk Moisturizing Cream: Aqua/Water/Eau, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, MyristylMyristate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Decyl Oleate, Glycerin, Propanediol, Caprae Lac/Goat Milk/Lait de Chèvre, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Alcohol.Goat Milk Soothing Body Lotion: Aqua/Water/Eau, Isocetyl Stearate, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Betaine, Glycereth-26, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Propanediol, C9-12 Alkane, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Caprae Lac/Goat Milk/Lait de Chèvre, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, Behenyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Dimethicone, Bisabolol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Parfum/Fragrance, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Erythritol, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
